sentences.en: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.cn: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

sentences.en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentences.en: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.cn: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.en: Everything’s fine at the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前一切都好。

sentences.en: He explained somewhat unconvincingly that the company was paying for everything.
sentences.cn: 他解释说公司会支付一切费用，这个说法有点令人不能信服。

sentences.en: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.cn: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.en: I felt that everything was going wrong.
sentences.cn: 我觉得一切都不顺利。

sentences.en: I tended to mistrust my emotions and intellectualize everything.
sentences.cn: 我往往不相信自己的情感，倾向于把一切事物都理智化。

sentences.en: In prison they'd taken away his watch and everything he possessed.
sentences.cn: 在监狱，他们把他的手表和其他一切东西都搜走了。

sentences.en: Oh God, you get so flaming worked up about everything.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪，你总是这么激动，真该死。

sentences.en: Patty began reading everything she could get her hands on.
sentences.cn: 帕蒂开始阅读她能找到的所有东西。

sentences.en: She radiates an infectious enthusiasm for everything she does.
sentences.cn: 她做任何事情都充满一种极富感染力的热情。

sentences.en: She sipped the wine. Everything was hazy now, except for Nick's face.
sentences.cn: 她小口地抿着酒。现在一切都变得模糊起来，除了尼克的脸。

sentences.en: she was articulate, she was fun—it seemed to me she had everything.
sentences.cn: 她善于言表，人又风趣——在我看来，她似乎是应有尽有。

sentences.en: The dug-outs were secure from everything but a direct hit.
sentences.cn: 除非是直接被击中，否则这个地下掩体是非常安全的。

sentences.en: The prisoners went on the rampage destroying everything in their way.
sentences.cn: 囚犯撒野闹事，砸毁了所有挡路的东西。

sentences.en: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
sentences.cn: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

sentences.en: They had to buy everything at inflated prices at the ranch store.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不在农场商店以高价购买所有东西。

sentences.en: This design knocks everything else into a cocked hat.
sentences.cn: 这一设计令其他作品相形见绌。

sentences.en: We have lost everything, but thank God, our lives have been spared.
sentences.cn: 我们已经失去了一切，不过谢天谢地，总算是保住了性命。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: you'll still get paid and everything.
sentences.cn: 你将仍会得到报酬以及其他东西。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)具有各种吸引力（或优势）

trans.tran_cn: 每件事，一切，形势，最重要的东西
